description: This file defines application configuration settings loaded from environment variables, including database connection info, JWT authentication parameters, and CORS origins. It provides a dataclass 'Settings' and functions to retrieve and process environment variables.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: Immutable dataclass representing application settings loaded from environment variables.

methods.name: list[str] _split_csv(value: str)
methods.description: Splits a comma-separated string into a list of stripped strings.

methods.name: list[str] _get_cors_origins()
methods.description: Determines CORS origins from environment variables 'ALLOWED_ORIGINS' or 'CORS_ORIGINS', defaulting to '*'.

methods.name: Settings get_settings()
methods.description: Loads and returns a 'Settings' object populated with environment variables, providing default values where appropriate.
